features: MULTIFUNCTION MAGIC RUBBER BROOM - It's not only sweeps but also scrapes the floor and windows! efficient in both dry and wet use! It effectively sweeps out fine dust & debris, and liquid spills and removes pet & human hair, sand, broken glass, and more!

ENJOY RESISTANCE-FREE SWIPING - Suits various surfaces and floors. It can be used as a floor and window squeegee, water wiper, and pushes broom in the garage, deck, shower, bathroom, and outside windows.

EASY TO MAINTAIN - Thanks to the high-density TPR material, which can be washed with water, is not afraid of soaking, and does not need to be wrung out. There is no hair entangled on this broom head after each use, simply rinse the smooth blades.

TRIANGLE FRAME DESIGN - It allows air to pass through while sweeping and prevents dust from disbursing as it glides along surfaces. the 45-degree angle tip design easily reaches into corners and edges. the broom head can be removed and used flexibly.

DURABLE STEEL LONG HANDLE - Long enough - 55", even tall adults don¡¯t need to bend down when using broom sweeping. 3-piece interlocking broom handle breaks down for easy storage or custom height adjustment. It comes with a traceless sticky broom holder which is convenient for storage and saves space!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What Makes It Unmissable? Multifunctional Broom It's not only sweeps but also scrapes the floor and windows. Suits various surfaces, efficient in both dry and wet use! Clean Better Sweeps fine dust particles,accumulated water, hair,cat litter and animal fur much better than regular broom. Adjustable Long Handle Even tall adults don’t need to bend down when using broom sweeping. the adjustable length handle for easy storage or custom height adjustment. More Sturdy The upgraded metal extension rod is more sturdy but light and does not shake when used. Easy to Clean Simply wash the smooth blades under running water after use.

WHY CHOOSE US? HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL EDGE The 17-inch sweeping width, high-density TPR material blade won’t weaken or break during tough cleaning jobs, resist bending and hold their shape. Enjoy resistance-free swiping for floors, windows, mirrors, bathroom, kitchen and many other surfaces. TRIANGLE FRAME DESIGN It's allows air to pass through while sweeping and prevents dust from disbursing as it glides along surfaces. the 45-degree pointed tip design easily reaches into corners, cracks, and edges that would be difficult to clean with a regular broom. EASY TO CLEAN There is no hair being entangled on this broom head after cleaning, simply wash the broom head under running water. EXTENDABLE POLE DESIGN The optional extension pole makes the broom length from 22 to 52 inches, People can choose the appropriate length according to their height. And long handle ideal for comfortable sweeping without the need to bend or strain your back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works amazingly well
reviews.reviewText: Very happily surprised at how well this works. It’s like a squeegee you can sweep with. I have it for a tiled breezeway that occasionally needs a squeegee and often a broom. This does both quite well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! A Must Try
reviews.reviewText: I got this on a deal and I must say WOW! It is easy to assembly, lightweight and easy to use. My old broom was needing replaced, came across this & wanted to give it a try for a more useful way to sweep up dirt. I was surprised it picked up dirt in areas that didn't seem dirty. I will be recommending! Shipping was super fast as well. Price. was cheaper than a broom that really does get everything up! Do yourself a favor and try this out asap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but to be completely honest..
reviews.reviewText: It’s very nice and if I hadn’t used the “original” one I would have liked it better but the pole kind of bends a little when you use it and feels flimsy. It saves a few bucks off the other one though, so if you’re ok with that the actual top of it works great for pet hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on pet hair
reviews.reviewText: I love this, I don't use a broom anymore, this is all I use, it picks up so much pet hair and every thing else

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as described
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and works as described. It's a good option to have if you can't run a vacuum at certain times for noise reasons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ok for small area/spill so not really necessary as just as easy ro pull out small vac. Have not used it on window cleaning or shower yet but I think it will be awkward to use in a shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and sturdy. Delivered on time. Works better than a regular broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: It took forever to get delivered and I wish it had gotten lost. The rubber gets stuck on the floor and makes it very hard to clean up anything, it is a pain to push anything into the dustpan and it just doesn't work at all as advertised. Instead of picking up trash it is going IN the trash!
